Comments_List: Shorten the linear algebra section and give more time to everything else. Make the earlier stuff and midterm harder or faster so that the later, less familiar material is less shocking.
Problem sets do not logically follow from the material presented in class. Expectations of connecting class material to the problem sets is too high. Tests are fair.

Pretty lukewarm. You'd probably learn new stuff, but since it's a big survey, there is probably also a lot of review that will be somewhat boring. I still think it was the right thing for me to take the class. I recommend it more if you think math is fun, less if you think it is only instrumental.
